SEARCH
Package upei.project

Class Players

java.lang.Object
upei.project.Players
public class Players extends Object
Represents a player in the game. Each player has a name, a strategy, and various attributes such as treasures collected, diamonds, rubies, and their current state in the game. Players can enter or leave the temple, secure their loot, and react to game events.

  • Constructor Details

    • Players

      public Players(String name)
      Constructor to initialize a player with a name only.
      Parameters:
      name - The name of the player.

    • Players

      public Players(String name, Strategy strategy)
      Constructor to initialize a player with a name and a strategy.
      Parameters:
      name - The name of the player.
      strategy - The strategy to be used by the player.

  • Method Details

    • depositLoot

      public void depositLoot()
      Secures the loot collected during expeditions by adding it to the player's total treasures. Ensures the player is out of the temple before securing the loot.

    • enteringTheTemple

      public void enteringTheTemple()
      Marks the player as entering the temple. Outputs a message indicating the player has entered the temple.

    • leavingTheTemple

      public void leavingTheTemple()
      Marks the player as leaving the temple. The player's collected loot is added to their total treasures. Outputs a message indicating the player has left the temple.

    • forceExit

      public void forceExit()
      Forces the player to exit the temple due to a trap. Resets the player's expedition loot to zero. Outputs a message indicating the player has been forced out.

    • getNameOfPlayer

      public String getNameOfPlayer()
      Gets the name of the player.
      Returns:
      The name of the player.

    • getPresentInTemple

      public Boolean getPresentInTemple()
      Checks if the player is currently present in the temple.
      Returns:
      True if the player is present in the temple, false otherwise.

    • getTotalTreasures

      public int getTotalTreasures()
      Retrieves the total treasures securely collected by the player.
      Returns:
      The total treasures collected by the player.

    • getHasExited

      public boolean getHasExited()
      Checks if the player has left the cave (either voluntarily or forcibly).
      Returns:
      True if the player has left the cave, false otherwise.

    • getTheStrategy

      public Strategy getTheStrategy()
      Retrieves the strategy associated with the player.
      Returns:
      The strategy used by the player.

    • setTotalTreasures

      public void setTotalTreasures(int totalTreasures)
      Updates the player's total treasures by adding the specified amount.
      Parameters:
      totalTreasures - The amount of treasures to add.

    • setExpeditionLoot

      public void setExpeditionLoot(int expeditionLoot)
      Updates the player's expedition loot by adding the specified amount. If the specified amount is zero, the loot is reset.
      Parameters:
      expeditionLoot - The amount of loot to add.

    • setHasExited

      public void setHasExited(boolean trapped)
      Sets whether the player has exited due to a trap or other reasons.
      Parameters:
      trapped - True if the player is forced out, false otherwise.

    • getTotalDiamond

      public int getTotalDiamond()
      Retrieves the total number of diamonds collected by the player.
      Returns:
      The total number of diamonds collected.

    • setTotalDiamond

      public void setTotalDiamond(int totalDiamond)
      Updates the player's total diamonds by adding the specified amount. If the specified amount is zero, the diamonds are reset.
      Parameters:
      totalDiamond - The number of diamonds to add.

    • getTotalRubies

      public int getTotalRubies()
      Retrieves the total number of rubies collected by the player.
      Returns:
      The total number of rubies collected.

    • setTotalRubies

      public void setTotalRubies(int totalRubies)
      Updates the player's total rubies by adding the specified amount. If the specified amount is zero, the rubies are reset.
      Parameters:
      totalRubies - The number of rubies to add.

    • getExpeditionLoot

      public int getExpeditionLoot()
      Retrieves the total loot collected during the current expedition.
      Returns:
      The total expedition loot collected by the player.
